personal.name: Kundan Kumar
personal.title: Full Stack Developer
personal.tagline: Building scalable, impactful, and user-focused digital solutions
personal.bio: Full-stack developer skilled in MERN, Next.js, PostgreSQL, AWS, and scalable cloud deployments. Experienced in building production-grade applications with a focus on performance, security, and user experience.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Get to know me better and understand my journey in the world of technology
storyContent: I'm passionate about creating user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems. My approach combines technical expertise with creative problem-solving, ensuring that every project I work on delivers exceptional value to users and stakeholders.

When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, or sharing knowledge with the developer community. I believe in continuous learning and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends and best practices.

experience.ctaDescription: I'm always open to new opportunities and exciting projects. Let's discuss how we can create something amazing together.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A showcase of my recent work and the technologies I've used to bring ideas to life
projects.ctaDescription: I'm always excited to work on new and challenging projects. Let's discuss your ideas and bring them to life together.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to start a project or just want to chat? I'd love to hear from you!
contact.connectDescription: I'm always interested in new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question or just want to say hi, I'll try my best to get back to you!
contact.availabilityDescription: I'm currently available for freelance work and full-time opportunities. I typically respond within 24 hours during business days.
contact.ctaDescription: I'm excited to hear about your project and see how we can work together to bring your ideas to life.

experience.description: Managed all technical operations, from design to deployment, including website development, backend systems, authentication, content management, cloud hosting, and analytics integration.
achievements: Built and deployed the company's complete digital presence
Integrated secure authentication and role-based access control
Optimized system performance and reduced load times by 35%

experience.description: Worked on multiple projects including developer portfolio, real-time chat app, job portal, and coin toss game.
achievements: Collaborated with team members to enhance product features

projects.title: Learning Management System (LMS)
projects.description: An online learning platform with secure access, course management, payments, and responsive UI.

projects.title: English-Speaking Course E-Commerce Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive e-commerce platform for English courses, built with Next.js 14, PostgreSQL, and Turborepo.

projects.title: Auto Number Dialer App
projects.description: An Android app for automated number dialing using Appium and Node.js.
